en.title: How to Identify a Trustworthy Breeder | 8 Checkpoints
en.content:
Getting a kitten from a trustworthy breeder is the first step toward welcoming a healthy kitten with a great personality.

8 Checkpoints

1. Registered as an animal handling business. 2. Welcomes visits. 3. Clean breeding environment. 4. Thorough kitten health management (vaccinations and testing). 5. Parent cat information is disclosed. 6. Genetic testing is performed. 7. After-adoption follow-up support is available. 8. Answers questions thoroughly and politely.

Warning Signs to Watch For

Be cautious if the breeder refuses visits, breeds multiple breeds in large quantities, tries to hand over kittens younger than 2 months, offers no health guarantee, or gives vague answers to questions.

Fuluck Cattery's Commitment

Fuluck Cattery is a registered animal handling business that welcomes visits, conducts virus and genetic testing, and provides post-adoption LINE support. We have maintained a 5.00 review rating and have received the Minna no Koneko Breeder Award.

zh.title: 如何辨别值得信赖的繁殖者 | 8个检查要点
zh.content:
从值得信赖的繁殖者那里迎接小猫，是迎来健康且性格良好的小猫的第一步。

8个检查要点

1. 拥有动物经营许可登记。2. 欢迎参观。3. 饲养环境干净整洁。4. 对小猫进行完善的健康管理（疫苗接种和检测）。5. 公开种猫信息。6. 进行基因检测。7. 提供领养后的跟踪支持。8. 对提问给予耐心细致的解答。

需要警惕的信号

如果繁殖者拒绝参观、大量繁殖多个品种、试图在小猫不满2个月时就交接、没有健康保障、或对提问含糊其辞，需要格外注意。

福楽猫舍的承诺

福楽猫舍已完成动物经营许可登记，欢迎参观，实施病毒检测和基因检测，并提供领养后的LINE咨询支持。我们保持着5.00的好评评分，并荣获了“大家的小猫繁殖者大奖”。
